values.description:
Established in 2004, Harvey John is a specialist recruitment consultancy sourcing Accountancy & Finance, Human Resources, Sales, Legal and Marketing vacancies on a temporary, contract and permanent basis.

The team of consultants at Harvey John has experience of working in niche markets utilising skills and methodologies including search, market mapping, testing, social media and digital strategies that are timely, unique and effective. 

Principles and values are core to our processes and behaviours from the selection of staff joining the business through to candidate and client relationships in our day to day working. 

As a business, we have built our brand around core values to understand each individual requirement creating value through expert knowledge with clear and balanced communication. Encourage to work with an open mind and a new perspective to find the right people for the right opportunities with a focus on delivery. We approach relationships with a business partnering and long term viewpoint adding value throughout the process.  

The vacancy listing on the Harvey John website is updated on a regular basis ensuring that opportunities are live and current.

For news and all the latest vacancies follow us on Twitter @HarveyJohnLtd

Head office is based in Brighton, East Sussex.
values.name: Harvey John

values.description:
Whether you are an individual or a business in need of legal advice, martin searle solicitors can help you. We help clients resolve a comprehensive range of employment law and community care law issues.

From offices in Brighton & Hove, Eastbourne, Gatwick & Crawley and Croydon, our employment law and community care solicitors provide support and legal advice that suits your needs. Expect a professional approach from a friendly solicitor that you can rely on to take your case seriously.

Our team has earned a reputation for being one of the leading law firms in Sussex by fighting tirelessly for the rights of our clients – leaving no stone unturned on the road to success. That is why our employment law and community care experts are frequently recommended by other solicitors.

Today, people from the south-east and across the UK seek our advice on recovering care home fees, complex workplace discrimination cases and everything inbetween – often on a no-win no-fee basis. It doesn't matter where in the country you are. If you need our help, get in touch today.
values.name: Martin Searle Solicitors

Varndean College, Brighton is a popular and successful sixth form college with over 1450 students aged 16 to 18. In the evenings it opens its doors to the community to offer a wide range of courses. Full or part-time Access courses have places for up to 60 mature students and the college is increasingly popular with international students.

Varndean’s mission is :

‘through the quality of its provision and support for a diverse community, encourage and inspire all its students to fulfil their potential’.

We offer a variety of construction solutions from minor works to major projects. We operate in the following sectors:-

Healthcare, Industrial & Commercial, Education & Lifelong Learning, Domestic, Refurbishment & Conservation.

Please contact us to discuss your requirements on 0844 - 225 - 2788.
values.name: Pentagon Construction Limited

values.description:
Stick It On started out as a humble Brighton club night with only one single mandate. 'To empower the many which had been held by the few.' Rob and Karim were frustrated, and a little bit annoyed, that DJing had become so elitist that clubland had suddenly got way too serious. Both were party DJs who loved good music whichever genre it came from. They played everywhere from pub’s, small clubnights and house parties but what was clear to them was how much fun getting behind the decks and playing music to people could be.

The feeling to share this and rebel against the ‘Superstar DJ’ phenomenon, that at the time, was sweeping the nation inspired them to become the antithesis of all of what that stood for.   Together they put on their first clubnight, essentially to a bunch of their friends, but this was the beginning of Stick It On.

The night was split into 15 minute slots for each person Stickin’ It On. It was open to anyone who fancied giving it a go. All they had to do was choose some of their favourite tunes (4/5 songs) that they wished to play to rock the dancefloor.

No DJ experience is necessary as a technical helper is close on hand to guide everyone through the whole process. It gave everyone the chance to rock the dancefloor, shake what your mama gave ya and enjoy yourself – Pure and simple.

That was the start of an idea that has far exceeded everybody's expectations. Stick It On is now becoming a very popular choice for wedding entertainment and corporate events.
values.name: Stick It On

values.description:
Xavier College first opened in 1878 and has a proud history as an Australian educational institution. We have three campuses – the Senior Campus in Kew (Years 9-12), Burke Hall in Kew (K-8), and Kostka Hall in Brighton (K-8) – educating 125 girls from Kindergarten to Year 4 and 1960 boys from Kindergarten to Year 12.

As a Catholic school within the spiritual tradition of St Ignatius Loyola, Xavier College belongs to a worldwide network of Jesuit schools whose origins lie in a vision he formulated four-and-a-half centuries ago.  A Jesuit education has a clear purpose: the development of a well-rounded Christian person of competence, conscience and compassion who will be of service in the world and has the generosity to make a contribution.
values.name: Xavier College, Kew

values.description:
The Power of Local Banking, 120 plus years in the making.

First National Bank in Howell established its roots as First State and Savings Bank in 1891 and merged with First National Bank of Howell in 1946. Over our 120 plus years in Livingston County, Michigan, it’s likely that your grandparents, parents, family, friends and neighbors have banked with us. 

Today, as the only bank headquartered in Livingston County, First National takes great pride as a key corporate citizen. From Brighton to Howell, Fowlerville to Whitmore Lake and Hamburg to Hartland, First National puts the power of local banking in your hands.  You see, this is the place we call home too.  The folks who make decisions here appreciate your history and hopes for the future because we share them too. 

Day to day, First National does much more than cash checks, take in deposits, issue ATM cards and make car loans. We reinvest your dollars wisely in your community. Your money helps businesses take off and grow and helps people like you buy a new home, send a child to college or live life according to your plan. No other area bank can make this claim: nine out of 10 loans are made here in Livingston County.  

The power of local banking is also evident in the more than $1 million First National has contributed to area organizations, causes and events. Add to this the hundreds of hours First National employees volunteer locally each year, and you’ll understand why we think local banking is the only way to go.

values: Business and Commercial Banking and Lending

values.name: First National Bank in Howell
